title: Instructional Behavior Analysis and Strategy Development to Improve Vocational-Technical Education Learning Efficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental job-related language proficiency and managerial competencies
context.additional_context: Customized Learning Environment Required for Language-Specific Job Competency Enhancement for Corporate Managers/Leaders. Personal Device Utilization and Sustained Focus Are Core Challenges

learning_goals: By applying a three-core instructional behavior analysis method (questioning, feedback, activity transition), learners can improve learning efficiency by over 20%.
Learners can explain how to measure learning effectiveness indices (AEVp, EV) using a lesson time allocation framework.
Learners can design personalized learning tasks and propose strategies for optimizing instructional behavior intervals.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
